channel.title: What do i need to change here

item.title: What do i need to change here
item.dc:creator: @im0wned im0wned
item.description:
@im0wned wrote:

[quote=“im0wned, post:2, topic:117096”]Replace

[code]public int eX = 0;
public int eY = 0;
public int etimer = 0;

public boolean showingCity = false;
public int showCityTimer = 0;
public int cityX = 0;
public int cityY = 0;

public boolean drunk = false;
public int drunkTimer = 0;

public boolean newAnimRequired = false;
public int newAnimDelay = 0;
public int newAnim = 0;

public int mageTimer = 0;
public String[] names = server.playerHandler.players[].playerName;
public int Chance = misc.random(1000);
public void randomPlayer()
{
int randomPlayer = misc.random(names.length);
if(Chance == 300)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = names[randomPlayer] + " has just been picked to play a minigame!";
if(playerName == names[randomPlayer])
teleportToX = 2674;
teleportToY = 3317;
sendMessage(“Now type ::randomgame to play!”);
}
}[/code]
with

[code]
public int eX = 0;
public int eY = 0;
public int etimer = 0;

public boolean showingCity = false;
public int showCityTimer = 0;
public int cityX = 0;
public int cityY = 0;

public boolean drunk = false;
public int drunkTimer = 0;

public boolean newAnimRequired = false;
public int newAnimDelay = 0;
public int newAnim = 0;

public int mageTimer = 0;
public int Chance = misc.random(1000);
public void randomPlayer()
{
if(Chance == 300)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " has just been picked to play a minigame!";
teleportToX = 2674;
teleportToY = 3317;
sendMessage(“Now type ::randomgame to play!”);
}
}[/code][/quote]

ok wat do i need to change in my coading

public int eX = 0; public int eY = 0; public int etimer = 0;

public boolean showingCity = false;
public int showCityTimer = 0;
public int cityX = 0;
public int cityY = 0;

public boolean drunk = false;
public int drunkTimer = 0;

public boolean newAnimRequired = false;
public int newAnimDelay = 0;
public int newAnim = 0;

public int mageTimer = 0;
public String[] names = server.playerHandler.players[].playerName;
public int Chance = misc.random(1000);
public void randomPlayer()
{
int randomPlayer = misc.random(names.length);
if(Chance == 300)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = names[randomPlayer] + " has just been picked to play a minigame!";
if(playerName == names[randomPlayer])
teleportToX = 2674;
teleportToY = 3317;
sendMessage(“Now type ::randomgame to play!”);
}
}
public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms
if (actionAmount < 0) {
actionAmount = 0;
}
